Summary: (GS) we were watching tv and saw several balls of fire on the sky, quiet and in uniform formation. after they reached a certain position, east, the fire balls disappeared . We watched from our balcony in FL facing east Atlantic Ocean.
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were watching tv 9\08\12 at about 9:45 pm when i saw these bright orange balls gliding in the sky, i thought they were helicopters but they had no sound and they glided through the night sky. the bright orange balls got to a point, facing east ( atlantic ocean ) and from our balcony we saw them disappeared going east,then more orange balls will show up taking the same course and the disappearing .
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Jupiter
There were no other sightings in Jupiter on or around September 8th 2012
